alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 11 at 7:38PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern Lincoln County and South Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 AM MST Friday. For the High Wind Watch, from Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect localized areas of reduced visibilities in blowing snow over the higher terrain.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; South Central Mountains
